column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Food is worth four stars
column2: but we had an issue being seated. There were two parties of 14. They seated us and realized we were the wrong group and asked us to get up
column3: go outside and wait longer. This wouldn't have been that big of an issue had it been handled a little more graciously. It was a bit harsh and without an apology. That being said
column4: Lou Malnati's has a warm & inviting atmosphere
column6: and our server Brandon did an excellent job making sure we were taken care of during our meal.
